name: Fontaine Research Institute
desc: The Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering was founded by Alain Guillotin and is often shortened to simply the Fontaine Research Institute.

customize.text: Illustrations
The Steambird Special Edition VI: Gear and Clockwork Roundelay

<color=#ffd780>August 15, 2023</color>
Hi, Travelers~
Let's admire the Artificed Dancers' Icewind Suite together!
"The Steambird Special Edition" Version 4.1

<color=#ffd780>September 19, 2023</color>
Hello, Travelers~ After the Version 4.1 update, the "Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region" and "Liffey Region" will be available in Fontaine! Check out this Special Edition of The Steambird to learn more about the special features of the new areas~
Notable Members

customize.name: Alain Guillotin
customize.desc: The adopted son of Emanuel Guillotin, who was raised at the Narzissenkreuz Institute with his adoptive sister, Mary-Ann. He is the founder of the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering, with his most notable contribution to Fontaine being his research in Pneuma-Ousia, which led to the invention of the Arkhe system and the creation of Clockwork Meka.

customize.text:
Founder of the Research Institute
<color=#ffffff73>Bossuet</color>
Former Senior Technician of the Bossuet Research Institute (formerly known as Alain Guillotin Memorial Research Institute)
Former Senior Technician
Senior Technician

Administrative Officer
Maillardet
Creator of

customize.name: Icewind Suite
customize.desc:
Artificed Dancers developed by the Fontaine Research Institute.

Bossuet originally intended for Artificed Dancers to be works of art that transcended the era of mechanical reproduction. But after Bossuet was forced to resign, the project was taken over by Maillardet, who had his own unique understanding of what he wanted to achieve. As a result, while their features were perfected during the course of its development, the Artificed Dancers gradually strayed from Bossuet's original vision.

customize.name: Genevieve
customize.desc: A former researcher of the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering.

customize.name: Clynes
customize.desc: A former researcher from the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering.

customize.name: Broglie
customize.desc: An entry-level member of the Fontaine Research Institute who specializes in hydrology. He was previously responsible for monitoring Fontaine's hydrology data.

customize.name: Sevigne
customize.desc: A member of the Fontaine Research Institute. After working as one of Bossuet's assistants, she continued her research in the laboratory underneath Mary-Ann Memorial Park.

customize.name: Coutrot
customize.desc: The real owner of Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop, who had disguised himself as Coutrot's alleged research partner, Kuisel. He had previously worked at the Fontaine Research Institute under Raimondo and Bossuet but was kicked out of the organization due to his immoral research about converting humans into clockwork meka.

customize.name: Bricole
customize.desc: A member of the Fontaine Research Institute. After witnessing Coutrot being kicked out of the Fontaine Research Institute by the Ethics Committee, he has been collecting clues about Coutrot's immoral research as part of an ongoing investigation of stolen assets from the organization.

customize.name: Hautemontagne
customize.desc: A researcher from the Fontaine Research Institute. She was sent to Qiaoying Village to repair the Three-Phase Asynchronous Elemental Tuner.

customize.text: Current or former researchers
Inventions

customize.name: Experimental Field Generator
customize.desc:
A large device designed by the late Edwin Eastinghouse. It has the ability to "counteract" the effects of gravity. According to the original design intentions, this was the first step in a plan to turn Fontaine into a city in the sky, so never again would the people have to worry about the waves that once swept over the land. Even if all seven nations were to be swallowed by the deeps, the elegant Court of Fontaine would float above it all, just like Celestia. Even the secrets of the universe would no longer seem so distant.

The Arkhium in the device's core has the characteristics of "splitting" or "precipitation," and can take matter, or certain things outside of matter, and separate them. It is said that this process can be reversed, but the Fontaine Research Institute is infatuated only with the physical effects it can produce.

customize.text: Generator designed by Edwin Eastinghouse to lift the Court of Fontaine into the air.

customize.name: Fonta
customize.desc: A specialty drink created by the Fontaine Research Institute. It is well-received by locals.

customize.text:
Famous drink
"Skyship Wingalet"
Ship created by Lourvine and Jurieu based on notes about the King Remus's ship, "Fortuna."

customize.name: Recon Log Mek
customize.desc:
One of the earliest new-type clockwork meka to be made.

It is said that during his time at the Institute of Natural Philosophy, the Lord-Artificer Guillotin created machines that could simulate genuine intelligence.

Though he never openly admitted it, this rumor nonetheless spurred on subsequent generations of ambitious engineers. Decades ago, one of them announced that they had created a machine that not only possessed basic thinking abilities but could also read human emotions, but in the end the results went unacknowledged.

customize.name: Arithmetic Enhancer Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka designed to transmit and enhance signals.

The power that drives this clockwork meka is generated from a controlled annihilation reaction between ousia and pneuma in the kinetic core. As a result, overloading it with excessive energy will cause its original equilibrium to be disrupted.

customize.name: Underwater Survey Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka designed for underwater surveying.

In the absence of significant breakthroughs in dynamics research, kinematics research has had the most significant impact on clockwork meka design. For machines designed to perform specific tasks, biomimesis has sometimes provided the most convenient solutions.

customize.name: Geological Survey Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka designed for surveying underground resources and certain minerals.

Due to the fact that the desired metal type can be set, this device has proven very popular among Treasure Hoarders and Adventurers alike.

customize.name: Underwater Patrol Mek
customize.desc:
This type of clockwork meka was designed to search out, repel, and if need be exterminate aquatic life forms that pose a threat to underwater equipment.

Ever since the first diluvian period, the Fontaine Research Institute has been preoccupied with the thought that there might be a second one. Some had the idea of taking back the ruins lost to the waves and building an underwater city, whereas others looked up to the untouchable sky islands overhead with the intention of building a metropolis in the clouds.

Underwater Patrol Meks were conceived by the former, but judging from the results, it is the latter that have gained the upper hand in recent years.

customize.name: Nimble Harvester Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka designed to dig up and transport soil.

Due to the inherent ability of the local water and soil to store and transmit ousia and pneuma, clockwork meka powered by the annihilation of these energies are highly favored in Fontaine. This also explains why adventurers may come across Ousia and Pneuma Blocks from time to time.

customize.name: Area Alert Mek
customize.desc:
A mechanism that is able to fire out the energy produced by an annihilation reaction. Strictly speaking, it was originally a test device that emerged from research undertaken by the Institute of Natural Philosophy before the Fontaine Research Institute had been established.

As such, despite its considerable commercial success as a sentinel and defensive device, most engineers do not consider it to be a true clockwork meka.

customize.name: Assault Specialist Mek
customize.desc:
Alongside the Recon Log Mek, this was one of the first new-type clockwork meka to be made (though of course, after hundreds of years, no one refers to them as "new-type" anymore – this was simply to differentiate them from traditional clockwork mechanisms that were powered by potential energy.)

It was named to commemorate a friend of its inventor, and was originally designed to help people. However, its ability to attack people – thereby avoiding the need to put friendly personnel at risk – subsequently came to be seen as its real strength.

customize.name: Suppression Specialist Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka adapted from the Cal. Scherbius type. Unfortunately, aside from its ability to attack, it has no other capabilities.

Clockwork meka based on annihilation energy normally produce their energy by utilizing Repeaters composed of special crystals to refine ousia and pneuma from Fontaine's environment. But outside of Fontaine, they can use pre-prepared Energy Blocks to move over short distances for short periods of time. The difference can be observed from the shape of the crystal components on the meka.

customize.name: Annihilation Specialist Mek
customize.desc:
Although the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering is the main organization involved in clockwork meka research and design, there are also many independent engineers and workshops that are not affiliated with the Research Institute.

The first ever machine of this type was designed by an independent engineer to commemorate their lover and sponsor. In the end, it was acquired by the Maison Gardiennage as a tool to uphold municipal security — or, as some would have it, state apparatus enforcing the monopoly on violence.

customize.name: Construction Specialist Mek
customize.desc:
A type of large clockwork meka which also has immeasurable value when utilized in building construction and archeological excavation. Its name comes from an engineer employed by Callas during the construction of the Clementine Line.

With Callas' financial backing, this engineer built the legendary "Golden Vessel" — a gigantic piece of construction machinery which was used to dig the Poisson Tunnel. Once the job was complete, this type of clockwork meka was designed with a similar structure but reduced to a smaller scale.

customize.name: Deepwater Assault Mek
customize.desc:
A clockwork meka designed to conducting underwater attacks. Unlike "Underwater Patrol Mek" models, it is expected to take on much larger and fiercer opponents. Of course, the price it pays for such capabilities and its cost of manufacture is that is unable to fully unleash its capabilities against smaller opponents.

Long ago, Fontaine was once scarred by the tragic invasion of a massive monster. The revered White Armada that sailed upon the great terrestrial lake was completely destroyed in defense of the nation. The designer hoped that were such a thing to happen again, the clockwork meka would possess enough naval firepower to be the first line of defense, going before the soldiers and generals.

customize.text: Meks created by the Research Institute for research and protection of the Fontainians

customize.name: Subdetection Unit
customize.desc: Detection units produced by Fontaine Research Institute using new models of artificed components. Its original purpose was monitoring all kinds of environmental data.

customize.text: Detection units produced by Fontaine Research Institute to monitor all kinds of environmental data.

customize.name: Icewind Suite
customize.desc:
Artificed Dancers developed by the Fontaine Research Institute.

Bossuet originally intended for Artificed Dancers to be works of art that transcended the era of mechanical reproduction. But after Bossuet was forced to resign, the project was taken over by Maillardet, who had his own unique understanding of what he wanted to achieve. As a result, while their features were perfected during the course of its development, the Artificed Dancers gradually strayed from Bossuet's original vision.

customize.text: Artificed Dancers developed by the Fontaine Research Institute.
Compact assistance meks developed to increase the overall utilization rates of meka teams, providing aid for underwater projects.
Old Institute

<color=#ffffff73>Before the explosion, the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering was the technological center of the entire Court of Fontaine. Alain Guillotin established the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering after leaving the Marechaussee Phantom. As the Fontaine Research Institute dedicates itself to studying machines and energy, clockwork meka research was the primary focus, with most mechanical inventions having come from this institute. Alain referred to the Suppression Specialist Mek as the "Cal. Scherbius" type as a tribute to his friend and assistant from the Institute of Natural Philosophy, Carter Scherbius.</color>

When Monsieur Bossuet became the supervisor, the institute was renamed the "Bossuet Research Institute." <color=#ffffff73>Junior Researcher Chisseray deemed that Mr. Bossuet's flawless decisions and wise leadership led to remarkable results in multiple research areas. Together, Bossuet and Chisseray introduced a new theoretical artificed core configuration. When compared to the traditional configuration created by Alain Guillotin, their calculations show that, in an ideal situation, the configuration's optimal output is slightly higher than the traditional one. The paper they created together elaborates on the operating principle and design requirements of the configuration and was selected as Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering's Outstanding Paper of the Year. As a result, Monsieur Bossuet was awarded the title of Senior Technician. After Mr. Bossuet left his post, everyone was scattered throughout the institute. According to Mr. Bossuet's original plan, Coppelius and Coppelia are clockwork meka dedicated to the art of dance. After Maillardet took over the project, Pneumousia was added, making them not only good at dancing but also highly capable fighters. Two different combat modes for Coppelius and Coppelia were created based on the differences between Pneuma and Ousia, Nemesis of Coppelius and Dirge of Coppelia. Edwin Eastinghouse is a former Senior Technician who conducted experiments using Arkhium to defy gravity with the hopes of lifting the elegant Court of Fontaine into the sky as a means to avoid the prophesied flood. His experiments were believed to be the cause of the massive explosion that destroyed most of the Fontaine Research Institute.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.desc: The adopted son of Emanuel Guillotin, who was raised at the Narzissenkreuz Institute with his adoptive sister, Mary-Ann. He is the founder of the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering, with his most notable contribution to Fontaine being his research in Pneuma-Ousia, which led to the invention of the Arkhe system and the creation of Clockwork Meka.

Bossuet originally intended for Artificed Dancers to be works of art that transcended the era of mechanical reproduction. But after Bossuet was forced to resign, the project was taken over by Maillardet, who had his own unique understanding of what he wanted to achieve. As a result, while their features were perfected during the course of its development, the Artificed Dancers gradually strayed from Bossuet's original vision.

A clockwork meka adapted from the Cal. Scherbius type. Unfortunately, aside from its ability to attack, it has no other capabilities.

Clockwork meka based on annihilation energy normally produce their energy by utilizing Repeaters composed of special crystals to refine ousia and pneuma from Fontaine's environment. But outside of Fontaine, they can use pre-prepared Energy Blocks to move over short distances for short periods of time. The difference can be observed from the shape of the crystal components on the meka.

customize.name: Arkhe - Pneuma & Ousia
customize.desc: A useful Fontainian mechanism for both exploration and combat that uses two opposing forces: Pneuma and Ousia

customize.text: Explosion

<color=#ffffff73>When a flood was prophesied to destroy Fontaine, institute researchers shifted their efforts to safeguard the entire nation. Arkhium is a mysterious yellow-green ore. With its vast energy potential and ability to break earthly constraints, Arkhium was once considered the key to the gate of salvation. Edwin Eastinghouse used Arkhium in the creation of the "Prototype Cal. Breguet" to counteract the effects of gravity. This was the first step in a plan to turn the Court of Fontaine into a city in the sky, in the hopes that never again would the people have to worry about the waves that once swept over the land. The Arkhium in the device's core has the characteristics of "splitting" or "precipitation," and can take matter, or certain things outside of matter, and separate them. It is said that this process can be reversed, but the Fontaine Research Institute is infatuated only with the physical effects it can produce. Initial estimates indicated that the device could lift an entire block of buildings.</color>

While conducting research, the Arkhium core within the field generator suffered an overload, triggering a colossal explosion that laid waste to the institute, for which Edwin Eastinghouse is blamed. This event propelled substantial blocks of Allogravity-Condensed Water Bodies and fragments of the institute into the atmosphere. Consequently, the Experimental Field Generator lost control and now occupies this area of the institute. The explosion claimed the lives of several researchers. Many of those who escaped unharmed chose to later leave the institute. Edwin disappeared after the explosion, with many believing him to be dead. However, he was dismissed from his post as Senior Technician with further investigation pending due to being absent from work for a long period without having submitted any application. Given his unique personality and unconventional research methods, the institute leaders were comfortable with his absence. Arkhium has come to be perceived as an ill omen by some, who attribute evil properties to the stones, foreseeing disaster for the greedy and misfortune for the ignorant. Others still see the potential value in Arkhium and consider there to be hidden potential within that has yet to be fully tapped.
<color=#ffffff73>The Arkhium Kinetic Core is the fruit of Raimondo's joint research with Edwin Eastinghouse. They believed that if they constantly injected the kinetic core with enough energy, it would easily allow the Experimental Field Generator to run at full power. After creating the core, they both realized they could barely find a way to keep injecting it with enough energy to keep it at maximum power. Edwin and Raimondo tried powering it with a mixture of Pneumousia and Arkhium energy or by connecting large numbers of Arkhium ores in series to create a super-powered group, but neither worked. They came across the giant Arkhium, and although it was always in an inert state, they were certain that this ore had unprecedented purity. They believed that, with the right treatment, the giant Arkhium could output the large amount of energy needed. Edwin and Raimondo had a disagreement due to Raimondo offering a more conservative proposal when Edwin wanted to solve the problem quickly. After the explosion, Raimondo promptly led the disaster investigation and evaluation efforts. The mixture of intelligence and passion at the Research Institute yielded outcomes that exceeded all expectations, regrettably, there is seldom anyone left to acknowledge this remarkable achievement.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Mysterious Ore
customize.desc:
A mysterious green-yellow crystalline ore.

Ore of the same type seems to mutually attract.

customize.text: New Fontaine Research Institute

<color=#ffffff73>As a result of the disaster, the institute was forced to recollect and build a new location near the old ruins while maintaining what was not destroyed in the explosion. The institute currently in working order is referred to as the "New Fontaine Research Institute." Raimondo and Choiseul share the heavy responsibilities that belong to the post of Director. Raimondo is responsible for getting scientific work and research back on track, and Choiseul is responsible for everything apart from that. For example, Choiseul is responsible for arranging funds related to manpower, quarterly budget allocations, re-accommodating visitors, and getting rid of those journalists together with Raimondo. Their main goal remains the same — to rebuild the Fontaine Research Institute and work hard for the well-being of all the people of the Court of Fontaine.</color>

Per Choiseul, the former site of the institute will be preserved forever and rebuilt as the Fontaine Research Institute Safety Education Center. Raimondo claims that once all of the retrievable research assets at the old site are recovered, the old Central Laboratory will be demolished, and the area's natural environment will be restored to its original state. This demolition will utilize the newly-researched "Experimental Field Generator." This device can deactivate the Gravity-Altering Field that surrounds the institute's ruins and land them on the ground safely. The energy source being used is the Tri-State Arkhium which is an inert variant of Arkhium that was created through a special transformation process. After entering the all-new "silent excitement state," it is much more stable than the original’s excited state.
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

Even if all seven nations were to be swallowed by the deeps, the elegant Court of Fontaine would float above it all, just like Celestia. Even the secrets of the universe would no longer seem so distant.

The Arkhium in the device's core has the characteristics of "splitting" or "precipitation," and can take matter, or certain things outside of matter, and separate them. It is said that this process can be reversed, but the Fontaine Research Institute is infatuated only with the physical effects it can produce.

customize.text: Present Day

Following the initial explosion, assumed to be caused by Edwin Eastinghouse, all of the institute's Arkhium fragmented, posing a perpetual risk of spontaneous excitation and subsequent explosion ever since. A secondary explosion, minor in comparison to the one caused by Mr. Edwin, occurred at the ruins of the Central Laboratory, which dispersed numerous condensing components of the Arkhium inhibitor into the surrounding waters. This secondary explosion was the result of energy flow affecting a small portion of Arkhium in the ruins. A suppression device was implemented, and the crisis was averted, however, a senior researcher named Mr. Nacker escaped. Mr. Nacker worked with Mr. Eastinghouse, and is believed to have triggered the small explosion in order to steal the Arkhium Kinetic Core to make a "small fortune."
<color=#ffffff73>Later, a special investigator named Miss Fusilier was hired to take charge of the stolen Arkhium Kinetic Core case. The main objective is to retrieve the Arkhium Kinetic Core as soon as possible, as it is an extremely unstable prototype. The investigation led Fusilier to Chaussivert, a self-proclaimed "Harbor-Watcher" of Lumidouce Harbor. Chaussivert disclosed critical information, which led the investigation to a shipment of goods that may reveal Mr. Nacker's whereabouts. A residence emitting clear residual energy readings all around was discovered as the investigation unfolds. Miss. Fusilier broke the house lock when none other than the missing Edwin Eastinghouse was found inside. Edwin surreptitiously pointed out Nacker's current whereabouts to be around the Fort Charybdis Ruins. Nacker revealed he was working on a "Field Generator" and was attempting to synchronize it with the Arkhium Kinetic Core in hopes of being the greatest kinetic engineer ever. It came to light that Edwin Eastinghouse led the investigation against Nacker on purpose, and he encouraged Nacker to go back to the institute and repent. Edwin wanted to get back to his research and claimed he wasn't present when the core exploded. After Nacker and Edwin exchanged a few words, Fusilier stated both of them harmed the interests of the institute and as the special investigator of the Fontaine Research Institute, she demanded both be taken to the institute to be dealt with accordingly. Upon arrival at the institute, after enough time has passed for Edwin and Raimondo to exchange words, the Maison Gardiennage's personnel arrived and took both Nacker and Edwin to the Fortress of Meropide.</color>

Jurieu and Lourvine are former researchers of the institute who are now hired as technical consultants by Wriothesley at the Fortress of Meropide. Jurieu is one of the highest-ranked researchers at the Fontaine Research Institute and used to work under Edwin. While Jurieu used to be Edwin's assistant, Lourvine used to be Jurieu's assistant. Jurieu's main areas of research were Arkhium and gravimeters. During his time at the Fortress of Meropide, Jurieu focused his efforts on creating the "Skyship Wingalet," a true flying ship, which helped rescue Fontaniane's during the flood.
<color=#ffffff73>Fonta is a specialty drink created by the Fontaine Research Institute that is well-received by locals. Fonta only comes in sweet flavors, and sparkles appear for a few seconds upon drinking it. Fonta currently has a trial product in the works, a blood-red drink, which is being tested on a smaller scale to see how it might be received by customers due to some backlash. Promoters came to the Fortress of Meropide and offered to sponsor the Pankration tournament so they could push their new product, but the Duke refused to even entertain the idea.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fonta
customize.desc: A specialty drink created by the Fontaine Research Institute. It is well-received by locals.

customize.name: Special Report
customize.desc: A special report privately printed by Chronie. It is said that the contents record the "truth" that the Fontaine Research Institute wishes to hide...

customize.name: Pankration Fonta Cup
customize.desc:
A trophy awarded for taking part in the Pankration recreational tournament as a coach, and guiding Genevieve and Poiret to victory in the championship. Made from classy-looking metal, under the right lighting, it gleams like shining Mora.

With this special trophy, you can get unlimited refills of refreshing Fonta at designated machines, drinking to your heart's content, and become the most satisfied enjoyer of fine drinks in the world...

customize.name: Arkhium Inhibitor Condenser Component
customize.desc: A condenser component once installed on the Arkhium Inhibitor. According to Raimondo, after they are all reinstalled, the inhibitor can be restarted.

customize.text: Official Buildings
Executive Office

<color=#ffffff73>Located at the intersection between the Liffey and Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering regions. The executive office is primarily responsible for the institute's various administrative tasks. The Institutes Safety Exhibition Project Director, Conjat, can be found here.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Liffey Region
customize.desc: Deep below the surface of the water, behind a wall of iron, a different kind of life force began to surge.

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.text: New Institute

<color=#ffffff73>The operational institute now goes by the name "New Fontaine Research Institute." The institute had to regroup and establish a new facility adjacent to the remnants of the old ruins, preserving what remained intact after the explosion. After completing various quests, numerous researchers are present here, including Broglie who specialized in hydrology research, Chisseray who is the Director of the Material Collation Team and a former research assistant of Bossuet, and Damestier who is the Director of the Fish-Type Clockwork Meka Research Team. The Fontaine Research Institute Administrative Officers, Choiseul and Raimondo, are also located here. Sevigne is a former research assistant of Bossuet who appears at the New Fontaine Research Institute after completing the quest Treacherous Light of the Depths.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.name: Sevigne
customize.desc: A member of the Fontaine Research Institute. After working as one of Bossuet's assistants, she continued her research in the laboratory underneath Mary-Ann Memorial Park.

customize.text: Materials Office

<color=#ffffff73>Chalmet is the Fontaine Research Institute Materials Retrieval Project Director. She can often be found in the Materials Office, continuously organizing documents and files according to Mr. Raimondo's instructions.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.text: Academic Assembly Hall

The circular design of the exhibition hall allows it to accommodate a larger audience while providing a better view. This hall is a venue for showcasing the fruits of the institute's research to the public, such as the combat-capable Artificed Dancers, the gramophone, and Turbine-Powered Glider. Some joke that Fonta may be the institute's lone scientific achievement that is still legally marketable.
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.text: Ruins of Central Laboratory

<color=#ffffff73>Located in the heart of the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering, it has the most advanced instruments in Fontaine. Currently, the primary research undertaken there is related to the "Experimental Field Generator." With the help of this "allogravity-condensed water," the ruins of the institute can be ascended safely and efficiently.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.text: Institute Dormitories

<color=#ffffff73>Although this area was not as impacted by the explosion, the dormitories are in need of renovation and have a limited power supply. When a researcher at the Fontaine Research Institute says they need rest, they only want a quick break for their brain. Then, they would usually come here, play piano, read, and have a drink or two if necessary. The dormitories of the institute do not have beds. According to Nacker, the researchers feel sleeping is a waste of time.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.text: Mary-Ann Memorial Park

<color=#ffffff73>A park dedicated to Alain's sister, Mary-Ann Guillotin. Underneath lies an underwater laboratory belonging to Bossuet.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.desc: The adopted son of Emanuel Guillotin, who was raised at the Narzissenkreuz Institute with his adoptive sister, Mary-Ann. He is the founder of the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering, with his most notable contribution to Fontaine being his research in Pneuma-Ousia, which led to the invention of the Arkhe system and the creation of Clockwork Meka.

customize.name: Mary-Ann Guillotin
customize.desc: The adopted daughter of Emanuel Guillotin and was raised in the Narzissenkreuz Institute with her brother Alain.

customize.text: Unofficial Areas
Representative Office

<color=#ffffff73>Here, the Qualifications Review Director, Desnos, can be found.</color> A <color=#ffffff73>dventurers come here for recruitment and Desnos conducts the preliminary qualification reviews.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Liffey Region
customize.desc: Deep below the surface of the water, behind a wall of iron, a different kind of life force began to surge.

customize.text: Research Labs and Hidden Studies
Bravais' Hidden Study
<color=#ffffff73>Unlocked only with Arkhium Lumenite, which requires forging in a special forging press, Bravais' Hidden Study is located near the Academic Assembly Hall.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Research notes found inside this study reveal researchers were working on a project that used Arkhium which had greater potential. Research Notes of Master Ruggiero are found here and discuss research related to the Golden Troupe, Fortuna, and Petrichor. Bravais' notes that Ruggiero was a true great master in his time and the founder of the Consilium Sapientium.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.name: Golden Troupe
customize.desc: A flower constructed out of clam, mother-of-pearl, and gold leaf. It blooms proudly.

customize.name: Arkhium Lumenite
customize.desc:
The result of forging Arkhium. It emits an unusual energy and light.

They say that such things can be used to open a gate somewhere...

customize.text: Bossuet's Laboratory

<color=#ffffff73>Bossuet was awarded the title of Senior Technician after his paper, Theoretical Analysis and Design of the Novel Artificed Core Configuration, was selected as Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering's Outstanding Paper of the Year. Monsieur Bossuet became the supervisor of the Alain Guillotin Memorial Research Institute and renamed it the Bossuet Research Institute. Per Junior Researcher Chisseray, who notes he was not mandated to say so by Monsieur Bossuet himself, Bossuet's flawless decisions and wise leadership led to remarkable results in multiple research areas.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.text: Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop

<color=#ffffff73>This area isn't private property, but an abandoned building that failed to become part of the Fortress of Meropide. After the disappearance of the workshop's previous owner, Coutrot assumed ownership and used the name "Kuisel" as a convenient character.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Assistants interested in furthering Kuisel's research regarding a neural network used to inquire through Researcher Bricole inside the workshop. Due to "failure to comprehend the meaning of his research," this project was ultimately taken away, which Coutrot said "will only obstruct the road to the technological singularity." According to Bricole, Coutrot's peculiar research got him kicked out of the Fontaine Research Institute.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
customize.desc: The pursuit of salvation came to a sudden stop, with former passion and pride turning into a broken, shattered dream.

customize.name: Liffey Region
customize.desc: Deep below the surface of the water, behind a wall of iron, a different kind of life force began to surge.

customize.name: Coutrot
customize.desc: The real owner of Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop, who had disguised himself as Coutrot's alleged research partner, Kuisel. He had previously worked at the Fontaine Research Institute under Raimondo and Bossuet but was kicked out of the organization due to his immoral research about converting humans into clockwork meka.

customize.name: Bricole
customize.desc: A member of the Fontaine Research Institute. After witnessing Coutrot being kicked out of the Fontaine Research Institute by the Ethics Committee, he has been collecting clues about Coutrot's immoral research as part of an ongoing investigation of stolen assets from the organization.

customize.text: Nacker's Hideout

<color=#ffffff73>Located within the Fort Charybdis Ruins, Nacker's hideout was used as a research lab where he worked on developing a ''Field Generator.'' He aimed to synchronize the ''Field Generator'' with the Arkhium Kinetic Core with aspirations of becoming the foremost kinetic engineer.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Morte Region
customize.desc: Who knows how long the story guarded with the tall tower on the sea that the people ignore has been kept?

customize.name: Experimental Field Generator
customize.desc:
A large device designed by the late Edwin Eastinghouse. It has the ability to "counteract" the effects of gravity. According to the original design intentions, this was the first step in a plan to turn Fontaine into a city in the sky, so never again would the people have to worry about the waves that once swept over the land. Even if all seven nations were to be swallowed by the deeps, the elegant Court of Fontaine would float above it all, just like Celestia. Even the secrets of the universe would no longer seem so distant.

The Arkhium in the device's core has the characteristics of "splitting" or "precipitation," and can take matter, or certain things outside of matter, and separate them. It is said that this process can be reversed, but the Fontaine Research Institute is infatuated only with the physical effects it can produce.
